name: LD42 Corrupted Core
description:
In the far future, in a galaxy far far away, face terrible monsters and CRT monitors to protect The Core!

You are the operator and with your mighty T.O.W.E.L., you will be tasked to build turrets to destroy all threats. But beware any damage to The Core will reduce the number of platforms on which you can build. And if you run out of place, it's the end.

Your arsenal of upgradable turrets will consist in:

  • Gunner turret : Ranged damage dealer
  • Teleportation turret : Allow you to reach it as fast as a click
  • Resource turret : produce energy you can collect
  • Area turret : Hurts everything in it's area

_____________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

  • < W;A;S;D > to move
  • < Q;E > to roll
  • < Space > to go up
  • < Shift > to go down
  • < Mouse Left > shoot/teleport (if aimed at a teleportation turret)
  • < Mouse Right > build/upgrade a turret
  • < Mouse Wheel > change selection
  • < Alt-F4 > to quit the game (< Esc > if you are on the end screen)
